title: Idiot actor, genius investor, bad boy: who is the real Ashton Kutcher?
text:
Demi Moore's autobiography gave an eye-opening glimpse into her relationship with Ashton Kutcher. But we're no closer to understanding his bizarre career, says Adam White

Depending on the paragraph, Ashton Kutcher is both the hero and the villain of Demi Moore’s new memoir Inside Out. On occasion he is described as being sensitive, charming and wise beyond his years, considerate in the way Moore’s ex-husband Bruce Willis wasn’t, sometimes romantic to the point of cloying. Other times he is cold and manipulative, expressing untruths to conceal genuine feelings and repeatedly cheating on Moore with 20-something blondes he picked up in bars and at bowling alleys.

Like much of the back-end of...
description: Demi Moore's autobiography gave an eye-opening glimpse into her relationship with Ashton Kutcher.
